Title: The Litvinov Ruse
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alex Gansa (teleplay by), Howard Gordon (story by), Patrick Harbinson (story by), Charlotte Stoudt (executive story editor)
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Sebastian Koch, Miranda Otto
Plot: The CIA and BND make a play, while Quinn reaches a terrifying discovery.
